name: Lancey
headline: AI agents to help product teams operate faster.
description: Lancey understands your product feedback, CRM and product analytics data to help product teams build their next big idea.

generated_description:
Lancey is a young and innovative company based in Toronto, Canada, founded in 2022 and selected for Y Combinator's Batch S22. With a lean team of just five employees, Lancey is on a mission to revolutionize how product teams operate by utilizing AI agents to streamline their work processes.

Their core offering is an AI-native feedback management platform that integrates various forms of customer-facing data, such as support tickets, sales calls, CRM data, and product usage analytics. By doing this, Lancey positions itself as the â24/7 AI PMâ for product teams, allowing them to identify impactful product opportunities without the manual, labor-intensive scrambles common in traditional feedback systems.

Lanceyâs platform automates the processing of feedback dataâcategorizing, tagging, and converting it into actionable insights. This means product teams can quickly turn feedback into concrete actions, like user interviews or creating product requirement documents (PRDs), ultimately speeding up both decision-making and development cycles. They also facilitate closing feedback loops with customers to keep them in the loop about the impact of their suggestions. 

Spandana Nakka, the CEO and founder of Lancey, has emphasized how their solution can process a quarter's worth of customer feedback in under an hour, enhancing the quality of product decisions and ensuring that user requests are acknowledged promptly.

Tags like artificial intelligence, machine learning, SaaS, and B2B highlight Lanceyâs technological focus and market orientation. Their comprehensive platform integrates easily with existing product stacks, making it accessible for teams looking to enhance their product development processes without a steep learning curve.

In essence, Lancey is streamlining the often cumbersome process of product feedback management, enabling product teams to focus on what really matters: creating products their customers care about. You can learn more and explore their offerings at [lancey.ai](https://lancey.ai).
